mapper.select: select association.ass_name,activity_id,activity.ass_id,activity_name,activity_brief,activity_type, activity_leave,activity_status,activity_people,activity_credit,activity_score, activity_create_time,activity_sign_begin_time,activity_sign_end_time,activity_begin_time,activity_end_time from activity,association where activity_name like "%"#{query}"%" and activity.ass_id = association.ass_id and activity_status = '审核通过'

select a.user_id,user_name,user_pwd,user_phone, user_credit,user_role,user_create_time from user a,user_activity b where a.user_id = b.user_id AND b.activity_id = #{activityId} AND user_name like "%"#{query}"%" and user_activity_status = '审核未通过'
